title: Rock Loops Pack
description: A collection of short rock loops suitable for videogame and indie game development. It contains 15 short energetic rock loops and building blocks for making longer songs.
longDescription:
Previews:
soundcloud.com/unreal-music-maketplace/rock-loops-demo-unreal-engine-marketplace
youtube.com/watch?v=bu1u6pl3cIw
youtube.com/watch?v=Xe0tJi1h6_M

A collection of short rock loops suitable for videogame and indie game development. It contains 15 short energetic rock loops, several beats long and seamlessly looping, to be used as level music, credits, menu, hold screen, etc. They share the same tempo and sounds, so they can be connected together to create a longer track if needed.

Included there are also 8 different loops introductions and 12 different ways to end the loops to create a standard song with intro and finish. Moreover, there are 10 different transitions to musically connect the loops one to the other.
